title: ritoplx free rp xd
body:
i do not have a life
https://prnt.sc/gu2ylx

replies.body: Hey congratulations on your hard work!  Grab a drink and take a break, you deserve it!  Not too long, though, you'll need to maintain those points! :P  We don't real have free stuff to give, but we might make exceptions for super low amounts.
lol xd u actually thought it was legit? im bronze 3 and i was trollin
Hey I have full confidence in our community!  Still, happy to help for a drawing.  :)
15 rp plx, here https://prnt.sc/gukamw it was made for my friend, actually i already sent it to her forgot to reply to u{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
That's a nice drawing, and very cool of you to make for your friend.  ^^ You might find your account with some extra RP!
:) magic... how did u do it
